properties.name: imported
properties.description: If true, the style was imported from another document.

properties.name: bulletChar
properties.description: Bullet character.

properties.name: numberingRestartPolicies
properties.description: Numbering restart policies.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of the ParagraphStyle.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the ParagraphStyle (a Document, Application or ParagraphStyleGroup).

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the ParagraphStyle within its containing object.

properties.name: nestedLineStyles
properties.description: A collection of nested line styles.

properties.name: nestedGrepStyles
properties.description: A collection of nested GREP styles.

properties.name: nestedStyles
properties.description: A collection of nested styles.

properties.name: tabStops
properties.description: A collection of tab stops.

properties.name: styleExportTagMaps
properties.description: A collection of style export tag maps.

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: preferences
properties.description: A collection of preferences objects.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the ParagraphStyle.

properties.name: basedOn
properties.description: The style that this style is based on. Can return: ParagraphStyle or String.

properties.name: nextStyle
properties.description: The style to apply to new paragraphs that follow paragraphs tagged with this style.

properties.name: appliedFont
properties.description: The font applied to the ParagraphStyle, specified as either a font object or the name of font family. Can return: Font or String.

properties.name: fontStyle
properties.description: The name of the font style.

properties.name: pointSize
properties.description: The text size.

properties.name: leading
properties.description: The leading applied to the text. Can return: Unit or Leading enumerator.

properties.name: kerningMethod
properties.description: The type of pair kerning.

properties.name: tracking
properties.description: The amount by which to loosen or tighten a block of text, specified in thousands of an em.

properties.name: capitalization
properties.description: The capitalization scheme.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The text position relative to the baseline.

properties.name: underline
properties.description: If true, underlines the text.

properties.name: strikeThru
properties.description: If true, draws a strikethrough line through the text.

properties.name: ligatures
properties.description: If true, replaces specific character combinations (e.g., fl, fi) with ligature characters.

properties.name: noBreak
properties.description: If true, keeps the text on the same line.

properties.name: horizontalScale
properties.description: The horizontal scaling applied to the ParagraphStyle.

properties.name: verticalScale
properties.description: The vertical scaling applied to the ParagraphStyle.

properties.name: baselineShift
properties.description: The baseline shift applied to the text.

properties.name: skew
properties.description: The skew angle of the ParagraphStyle.

properties.name: fillTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the fill color of the ParagraphStyle. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

properties.name: strokeTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the stroke color of the ParagraphStyle. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

properties.name: strokeWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight applied to the characters of the text.

properties.name: overprintStroke
properties.description: If true, the stroke of the characters will overprint.

properties.name: overprintFill
properties.description: If true, the fill color of the characters will overprint.

properties.name: otfFigureStyle
properties.description: The figure style in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfOrdinal
properties.description: If true, uses ordinals in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfFraction
properties.description: If true, uses fractions in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfDiscretionaryLigature
properties.description: If true, uses discretionary ligatures in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfTitling
properties.description: If true, uses titling forms in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfContextualAlternate
properties.description: If true, uses contextual alternate forms in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfSwash
properties.description: If true, uses swash forms in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: underlineColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the underline stroke. . Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: underlineGapColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the underline stroke. Note: Valid when underline type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: underlineTint
properties.description: The underline stroke tint (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: underlineGapTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the gap color of the underline stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when underline type is not solid.

properties.name: underlineOverprint
properties.description: If true, the underline stroke color will overprint.

properties.name: underlineGapOverprint
properties.description: If true, the gap color of the underline stroke will overprint.

properties.name: underlineType
properties.description: The stroke type of the underline stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

properties.name: underlineOffset
properties.description: The amount by which to offset the underline from the text baseline.

properties.name: underlineWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight of the underline stroke.

properties.name: strikeThroughColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: strikeThroughGapColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: strikeThroughTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: strikeThroughGapTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid.

properties.name: strikeThroughOverprint
properties.description: If true, the strikethrough stroke will overprint.

properties.name: strikeThroughGapOverprint
properties.description: If true, the gap color of the strikethrough stroke will overprint. Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid.

properties.name: strikeThroughType
properties.description: The stroke type of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

properties.name: strikeThroughOffset
properties.description: The amount by which to offset the strikethrough stroke from the text baseline.

properties.name: strikeThroughWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight of the strikethrough stroke.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the ParagraphStyle. . Can also accept: String.

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the ParagraphStyle. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: appliedLanguage
properties.description: The language of the text. Can return: LanguageWithVendors or Language. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: paragraphKashidaWidth
properties.description: Paragraph kashida width. 0 is none, 1 is short, 2 is medium, 3 is long

properties.name: alignToBaseline
properties.description: If true, aligns the baseline of the text to the baseline grid.

properties.name: firstLineIndent
properties.description: The amount to indent the first line.

properties.name: leftIndent
properties.description: The width of the left indent.

properties.name: rightIndent
properties.description: The width of the right indent.

properties.name: spaceBefore
properties.description: The height of the paragraph space above.

properties.name: spaceAfter
properties.description: The height of the paragraph space below.

properties.name: balanceRaggedLines
properties.description: If true or set to an enumeration value, balances ragged lines. Note: Not valid with a single-line text composer. Can return: Boolean or BalanceLinesStyle enumerator.

properties.name: justification
properties.description: The paragraph alignment.

properties.name: singleWordJustification
properties.description: The alignment to use for lines that contain a single word.

properties.name: autoLeading
properties.description: The percent of the type size to use for auto leading. (Range: 0 to 500).

properties.name: dropCapLines
properties.description: The number of lines to drop cap.

properties.name: dropCapCharacters
properties.description: The number of characters to drop cap.

properties.name: keepLinesTogether
properties.description: If true, keeps a specified number of lines together when the paragraph breaks across columns or text frames.

properties.name: keepAllLinesTogether
properties.description: If true, keeps all lines of the paragraph together. If false, allows paragraphs to break across pages or columns.

properties.name: keepWithNext
properties.description: The minimum number of lines to keep with the next paragraph.

properties.name: keepFirstLines
properties.description: The minimum number of lines to keep together in a paragraph before allowing a page break.

properties.name: keepLastLines
properties.description: The minimum number of lines to keep together in a paragraph after a page break.

properties.name: startParagraph
properties.description: The location at which to start the paragraph.

properties.name: composer
properties.description: The text composer to use to compose the text.

properties.name: minimumWordSpacing
properties.description: The minimum word spacing, specified as a percentage of the font word space value. Note: Valid only when text is justified. (Range: 0 to 1000)

properties.name: maximumWordSpacing
properties.description: The maximum word spacing, specified as a percentage of the font word space value. Note: Valid only when text is justified. (Range: 0 to 1000)

properties.name: desiredWordSpacing
properties.description: The desired word spacing, specified as a percentage of the font word space value. (Range: 0 to 1000)

properties.name: minimumLetterSpacing
properties.description: The minimum letter spacing, specified as a percentge of the built-in space between letters in the font. (Range: -100 to 500) Note: Valid only when text is justified.

properties.name: maximumLetterSpacing
properties.description: The maximum letter spacing, specified as a percentge of the built-in space between letters in the font. (Range: -100 to 500) Note: Valid only when text is justified.

properties.name: desiredLetterSpacing
properties.description: The desired letter spacing, specified as a percentge of the built-in space between letters in the font. (Range: -100 to 500)

properties.name: minimumGlyphScaling
properties.description: The minimum width (as a percentage) of individual characters. (Range: 50 to 200)

properties.name: maximumGlyphScaling
properties.description: The maximum width (as a percentage) of individual characters. (Range: 50 to 200)

properties.name: desiredGlyphScaling
properties.description: The desired width (as a percentage) of individual characters. (Range: 50 to 200)

properties.name: ruleAbove
properties.description: If true, places a rule above the paragraph.

properties.name: ruleAboveOverprint
properties.description: If true, the paragraph rule above will overprint.

properties.name: ruleAboveLineWeight
properties.description: The line weight of the rule above.

properties.name: ruleAboveTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the paragraph rule above. (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: ruleAboveOffset
properties.description: The amount to offset the paragraph rule above from the baseline of the first line the paragraph.

properties.name: ruleAboveLeftIndent
properties.description: The distance to indent the left edge of the paragraph rule above (based on either the text width or the column width of the first line in the paragraph.

properties.name: ruleAboveRightIndent
properties.description: The distance to indent the right edge of the paragraph rule above (based on either the text width or the column width of the first line in the paragraph.

properties.name: ruleAboveWidth
properties.description: The basis (text width or column width) used to calculate the width of the paragraph rule above.

properties.name: ruleAboveColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the paragraph rule above. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: ruleAboveGapColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke gap of the paragraph rule above. Note: Valid only when the paragraph rule above type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: ruleAboveGapTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the stroke gap color of the paragraph rule. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when the rule above type is not solid.

properties.name: ruleAboveGapOverprint
properties.description: If true, the stroke gap of the paragraph rule above will overprint. Note: Valid only the rule above type is not solid.

properties.name: ruleAboveType
properties.description: The stroke type of the rule above the paragraph. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

properties.name: ruleBelow
properties.description: If true, applies a paragraph rule below.

properties.name: ruleBelowLineWeight
properties.description: The line weight of the rule below.

properties.name: ruleBelowTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the paragraph rule below. (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: ruleBelowOffset
properties.description: The amount to offset the the paragraph rule below from the baseline of the last line of the paragraph.

properties.name: ruleBelowLeftIndent
properties.description: The distance to indent the left edge of the paragraph rule below (based on either the text width or the column width of the last line in the paragraph.

properties.name: ruleBelowRightIndent
properties.description: The distance to indent the right edge of the paragraph rule below (based on either the text width or the column width of the last line in the paragraph.

properties.name: ruleBelowWidth
properties.description: The basis (text width or column width) used to calculate the width of the paragraph rule below.

properties.name: ruleBelowColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the paragraph rule below. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: ruleBelowGapColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke gap of the paragraph rule below. Note: Valid only when the paragraph rule below type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: ruleBelowGapTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the stroke gap color of the paragraph rule below. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when the paragraph rule below type is not solid.

properties.name: ruleBelowType
properties.description: The stroke type of the rule below the paragraph. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

properties.name: hyphenateCapitalizedWords
properties.description: If true, allows hyphenation of capitalized words.

properties.name: hyphenation
properties.description: If true, allows hyphenation.

properties.name: hyphenateBeforeLast
properties.description: The minimum number of letters at the end of a word that can be broken by a hyphen.

properties.name: hyphenateAfterFirst
properties.description: The mininum number of letters at the beginning of a word that can be broken by a hyphen.

properties.name: hyphenateWordsLongerThan
properties.description: The minimum number of letters a word must have in order to qualify for hyphenation.

properties.name: hyphenateLadderLimit
properties.description: The maximum number of hyphens that can appear on consecutive lines. To specify unlimited consecutive lines, use zero.

properties.name: hyphenationZone
properties.description: The amount of white space allowed at the end of a line of non-justified text before hypenation begins. Note: Valid when composer is single-line composer.

properties.name: hyphenWeight
properties.description: The relative desirability of better spacing vs. fewer hyphens. A lower value results in greater use of hyphens. (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: dropCapStyle
properties.description: The character style to apply to the drop cap. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: lastLineIndent
properties.description: The amount to indent the last line in the paragraph.

properties.name: hyphenateLastWord
properties.description: If true, allows hyphenation in the last word in a paragraph. Note: Valid only when hyphenation is true.

properties.name: otfSlashedZero
properties.description: If true, use a slashed zeroes in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfHistorical
properties.description: If true, use historical forms in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfStylisticSets
properties.description: The stylistic sets to use in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: gradientFillLength
properties.description: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the text.

properties.name: gradientFillAngle
properties.description: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the text. (Range: -180 to 180)

properties.name: gradientStrokeLength
properties.description: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the stroke of the text.

properties.name: gradientStrokeAngle
properties.description: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the text. (Range: -180 to 180)

properties.name: gradientFillStart
properties.description: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the text, in the format [x, y].

properties.name: gradientStrokeStart
properties.description: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the stroke of the text, in the format [x, y].

properties.name: keepWithPrevious
properties.description: If the first line in the paragraph should be kept with the last line of previous paragraph.

properties.name: spanSplitColumnCount
properties.description: The number of columns a paragraph spans or the number of split columns. Can return: Short Integer (1 - 40) or SpanColumnCountOptions enumerator.

properties.name: spanColumnType
properties.description: Whether a paragraph should be a single column, span columns or split columns

properties.name: splitColumnInsideGutter
properties.description: The inside gutter if the paragraph splits columns

properties.name: splitColumnOutsideGutter
properties.description: The outside gutter if the paragraph splits columns

properties.name: spanColumnMinSpaceBefore
properties.description: The minimum space before a span or a split column

properties.name: spanColumnMinSpaceAfter
properties.description: The minimum space after a span or a split column

properties.name: ruleBelowOverprint
properties.description: If true, the rule below will overprint.

properties.name: ruleBelowGapOverprint
properties.description: If true, the gap color of the rule below will overprint.

properties.name: dropcapDetail
properties.description: Details about the drop cap based on the glyph outlines. 1 = left side bearing. 2 = descenders. 0x100,0x200,0x400 are used for Japanese frame grid.

properties.name: hyphenateAcrossColumns
properties.description: If true, allows the last word in a text column to be hyphenated.

properties.name: keepRuleAboveInFrame
properties.description: If true, forces the rule above the paragraph to remain in the frame bounds. Note: Valid only when rule above is true.

properties.name: ignoreEdgeAlignment
properties.description: If true, ignores optical edge alignment for the paragraph.

properties.name: otfMark
properties.description: If true, uses mark positioning in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfLocale
properties.description: If true, uses localized forms in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: positionalForm
properties.description: The OpenType positional form.

properties.name: previewColor
properties.description: The color to use for preview, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: paragraphDirection
properties.description: Paragraph direction.

properties.name: paragraphJustification
properties.description: Paragraph justification.
The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter (pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join.
properties.name: miterLimit
strokeAlignment
properties.description: The stroke alignment applied to the text.

properties.name: endJoin
properties.description: The stroke join type applied to the characters of the text.

properties.name: otfOverlapSwash
properties.description: If true, use overlapping swash forms in OpenType fonts

properties.name: otfStylisticAlternate
properties.description: If true, use stylistic alternate forms in OpenType fonts

properties.name: otfJustificationAlternate
properties.description: If true, use alternate justification forms in OpenType fonts

properties.name: otfStretchedAlternate
properties.description: If true, use stretched alternate forms in OpenType fonts

properties.name: characterDirection
properties.description: The direction of the character.

properties.name: keyboardDirection
properties.description: The keyboard direction of the character.

properties.name: digitsType
properties.description: The digits type.

properties.name: kashidas
properties.description: Use of Kashidas for justification

properties.name: diacriticPosition
properties.description: Position of diacriticical characters.

properties.name: xOffsetDiacritic
properties.description: The x (horizontal) offset for diacritic adjustment.

properties.name: yOffsetDiacritic
properties.description: The y (vertical) offset for diacritic adjustment.

properties.name: tabList
properties.description: A list of the tab stops in the paragraph. Can return: Array of Arrays of Property Name/Value Pairs.

properties.name: gridAlignFirstLineOnly
properties.description: If true, aligns only the first line to the frame grid or baseline grid. If false, aligns all lines to the grid.

properties.name: gridAlignment
properties.description: The alignment to the frame grid or baseline grid.

properties.name: gridGyoudori
properties.description: The manual gyoudori setting.

properties.name: autoTcy
properties.description: The number of half-width characters at or below which the characters automatically run horizontally in vertical text.

properties.name: autoTcyIncludeRoman
properties.description: If true, auto tcy includes Roman characters.

properties.name: kinsokuSet
properties.description: The kinsoku set that determines legitimate line breaks. Can return: KinsokuTable, KinsokuSet enumerator or String.

properties.name: kinsokuType
properties.description: The type of kinsoku processing for preventing kinsoku characters from beginning or ending a line. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is defined.

properties.name: kinsokuHangType
properties.description: The type of hanging punctuation to allow. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is in effect.

properties.name: bunriKinshi
properties.description: If true, adds the double period (..), ellipse (...), and double hyphen (--) to the selected kinsoku set. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is in effect.

properties.name: mojikumi
properties.description: The mojikumi table. For information, see mojikumi table defaults. Can return: MojikumiTable, String or MojikumiTableDefaults enumerator.

properties.name: rensuuji
properties.description: If true, disallows line breaks in numbers. If false, lines can break between digits in multi-digit numbers.

properties.name: rotateSingleByteCharacters
properties.description: If true, rotates Roman characters in vertical text.

properties.name: leadingModel
properties.description: The point from which leading is measured from line to line.

properties.name: characterAlignment
properties.description: The alignment of small characters to the largest character in the line.

properties.name: tsume
properties.description: The amount of horizontal character compression.

properties.name: leadingAki
properties.description: The amount of space before each character.

properties.name: trailingAki
properties.description: The amount of space after each character.

properties.name: characterRotation
properties.description: The rotation angle (in degrees) of individual characters. Note: The rotation is counterclockwise.

properties.name: jidori
properties.description: The number of grid squares in which to arrange the text.

properties.name: shataiMagnification
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) of shatai obliquing to apply.

properties.name: shataiDegreeAngle
properties.description: The shatai lens angle (in degrees).

properties.name: shataiAdjustRotation
properties.description: If true, applies shatai rotation.

properties.name: shataiAdjustTsume
properties.description: If true, adjusts shatai tsume.

properties.name: tatechuyoko
properties.description: If true, makes the character horizontal in vertical text.

properties.name: tatechuyokoXOffset
properties.description: The horizontal offset for horizontal characters in vertical text.

properties.name: tatechuyokoYOffset
properties.description: The vertical offset for horizontal characters in vertical text.

properties.name: kentenFillColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: kentenStrokeColor
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: kentenTint
properties.description: The fill tint (as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: kentenStrokeTint
properties.description: The stroke tint (as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: kentenWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight (in points) of kenten characters.

properties.name: kentenOverprintFill
properties.description: The method of overprinting the kenten fill.

properties.name: kentenOverprintStroke
properties.description: The method of overprinting the kenten stroke.

properties.name: kentenKind
properties.description: The style of kenten characters.

properties.name: kentenPlacement
properties.description: The distance between kenten characters and their parent characters.

properties.name: kentenAlignment
properties.description: The alignment of kenten characters relative to the parent characters.

properties.name: kentenPosition
properties.description: The kenten position relative to the parent character.

properties.name: kentenFont
properties.description: The font to use for kenten characters. Can return: Font or String.

properties.name: kentenFontStyle
properties.description: The font style of kenten characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: kentenFontSize
properties.description: The size (in points) of kenten characters.

properties.name: kentenXScale
properties.description: The horizontal size of kenten characters as a percent of the original size.

properties.name: kentenYScale
properties.description: The vertical size of kenten charachers as a percent of the original size.

properties.name: kentenCustomCharacter
properties.description: The character used for kenten. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom.

properties.name: kentenCharacterSet
properties.description: The character set used for the custom kenten character. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom.

properties.name: rubyFill
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: rubyStroke
properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

properties.name: rubyTint
properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the ruby fill color. (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: rubyWeight
properties.description: The stroke weight (in points) of ruby characters.

properties.name: rubyOverprintFill
properties.description: The method of overprinting the ruby fill.

properties.name: rubyOverprintStroke
properties.description: The method of overprinting the ruby stroke.

properties.name: rubyStrokeTint
properties.description: The stroke tint (as a percentage) of ruby characters.

properties.name: rubyFont
properties.description: The font applied to ruby characters. Can return: Font or String.

properties.name: rubyFontStyle
properties.description: The font style of ruby characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rubyFontSize
properties.description: The size (in points) of ruby characters.

properties.name: rubyOpenTypePro
properties.description: If true, uses OpenType Pro fonts for ruby.

properties.name: rubyXScale
properties.description: The horizontal size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size.

properties.name: rubyYScale
properties.description: The vertical size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size.

properties.name: rubyType
properties.description: The ruby type.

properties.name: rubyAlignment
properties.description: The ruby alignment.

properties.name: rubyPosition
properties.description: The position of ruby characters relative to the parent text.

properties.name: rubyXOffset
properties.description: The amount of horizontal space between ruby and parent characters.

properties.name: rubyYOffset
properties.description: The amount of vertical space between ruby and parent characters.

properties.name: rubyParentSpacing
properties.description: The ruby spacing relative to the parent text.

properties.name: rubyAutoAlign
properties.description: If true, auto aligns ruby.

properties.name: rubyOverhang
properties.description: If true, constrains ruby overhang to the specified amount. For information on specifying an amount, see ruby parent overhang amount.

properties.name: rubyAutoScaling
properties.description: If true, automatically scales ruby to the specified percent of parent text size. For information on specifying a percent, see ruby parent scaling percent.

properties.name: rubyParentScalingPercent
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) to scale the parent text size to determine the ruby text size.

properties.name: rubyParentOverhangAmount
properties.description: The amount by which ruby characters can overhang the parent text.

properties.name: warichu
properties.description: If true, turns on warichu.

properties.name: warichuSize
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) to scale parent text size to determine warichu size.

properties.name: warichuLines
properties.description: The number of lines of warichu within a single normal line.

properties.name: warichuLineSpacing
properties.description: The gap between lines of warichu characters.

properties.name: warichuAlignment
properties.description: The warichu alignment.

properties.name: warichuCharsAfterBreak
properties.description: The minimum number of characters allowed after a line break.

properties.name: warichuCharsBeforeBreak
properties.description: The minimum number of characters allowed before a line break.

properties.name: otfProportionalMetrics
properties.description: If true, kerns according to proportional CJK metrics in OpenType fonts.

properties.name: otfHVKana
properties.description: If true, switches hiragana fonts, which have different glyphs for horizontal and vertical.

properties.name: otfRomanItalics
properties.description: If true, applies italics to half-width alphanumerics.

properties.name: scaleAffectsLineHeight
properties.description: If true, the line changes size when characters are scaled.

properties.name: cjkGridTracking
properties.description: If true, uses grid tracking to track non-Roman characters in CJK grids.

properties.name: glyphForm
properties.description: The glyph variant to substitute for standard glyphs.

properties.name: paragraphGyoudori
properties.description: If true, the gyoudori mode applies to the entire paragraph. If false, the gyoudori mode applies to each line in the paragraph.

properties.name: rubyAutoTcyDigits
properties.description: The number of digits included in auto tcy (tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby.

properties.name: rubyAutoTcyIncludeRoman
properties.description: If true, includes Roman characters in auto tcy (tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby.

properties.name: rubyAutoTcyAutoScale
properties.description: If true, automatically scales glyphs in auto tcy (tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby to fit one em.

properties.name: treatIdeographicSpaceAsSpace
properties.description: If true, ideographic spaces will not wrap to the next line like text characters.

properties.name: allowArbitraryHyphenation
properties.description: If true, words unassociated with a hyphenation dictionary can break to the next line on any character.

properties.name: bulletsAndNumberingListType
properties.description: List type for bullets and numbering.

properties.name: bulletsCharacterStyle
properties.description: The character style to be used for the text after string. Can return: CharacterStyle or String.

properties.name: numberingCharacterStyle
properties.description: The character style to be used for the number string. Can return: CharacterStyle or String.

properties.name: numberingExpression
properties.description: The number string expression for numbering.

properties.name: bulletsTextAfter
properties.description: The text after string expression for bullets.

properties.name: appliedNumberingList
properties.description: The list to be part of. Can return: NumberingList or String.

properties.name: numberingLevel
properties.description: The level of the paragraph.

properties.name: numberingFormat
properties.description: Numbering format options. Can return: NumberingStyle enumerator or String.

properties.name: numberingContinue
properties.description: Continue the numbering at this level.

properties.name: numberingStartAt
properties.description: Determines starting number in a numbered list.

properties.name: numberingApplyRestartPolicy
properties.description: If true, apply the numbering restart policy.

properties.name: bulletsAlignment
properties.description: The alignment of the bullet character.

properties.name: numberingAlignment
properties.description: The alignment of the number.

properties.name: label
properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameters.name: replacingWith
parameters.description: The style to apply in place of the deleted style. (Optional)

methods.name: move
methods.description: Moves the style to the specified location.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: ParagraphStyle, ParagraphStyleGroup, CharacterStyle, CharacterStyleGroup, CellStyle, CellStyleGroup, TableStyle, TableStyleGroup, Document or Application. (Optional)

methods.name: convertBulletsAndNumberingToText
methods.description: Convert bullets and numbering to text.

methods.name: insertLabel
methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: extractLabel
methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ParagraphStyle.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
